Use a Quarto document to write a brief semester project proposal (250-500 words; no citations necessary) that meets the *Project Content* criteria outlined in the *Semester Project Rubric* document on Canvas. Be sure to include:

- A description of the main topic or research question for the project

- A list of all datasets to be cleaned/curated/combined for the project

- Location information for each dataset (e.g. url, contact information for data custodian, etc.)

- A list of skills/practices from the course that you will use

- Examples of expected novel outputs of the analysis
